ingredients.ingredient: Kroger® Spreadable Butter With Olive Oil & Sea Salt

instructions.instruction: Wash the dirt off the potato
Poke holes in the potato to allow steam to escape
Put on plate in microwave and cook for 8 minutes
If a fork is easily pushed in, its done, otherwise cook for an additional 2 minutes
Wash the dirt off the potato
Poke holes in the potato to allow steam to escape
Place potato on oven safe tray and cook for 45 minutes
If a fork is easily pushed in, its done, otherwise cook for an additional 10 minutes

cooking_tips: Poking holes in the potato allows steam to escape, if you don't the potato could explode, especially in the microwave!
